items.a: mWallet is a digital portfolio manager available in the mBank app. It allows you to manage your savings, investments, expenses, and subscriptions in one place. With mWallet, you gain a complete overview of your finances and can plan your budget effectively.
Yes. mWallet is completely free for mBank clients. You can use all features without any additional fees.

items.q: Is mWallet available only on mobile or also on desktop?
items.a: mWallet is available both in the mobile app and in mBank's online banking. All your data is synchronized across devices in real time.

With mWallet you get:

- an overview of all accounts and cards
- real-time expense analytics
- automatic expense categorization
- reminders for bills and subscriptions
- integration with investments and savings

items.q: Can I add accounts from other banks to mWallet?
items.a: Yes. mWallet supports connecting accounts from other Polish banks through open banking (PSD2). Simply add the external account and confirm access.

items.q: What data does mBank collect in mWallet?
items.a: mWallet uses transaction data already available in your mBank account. If you add external accounts, their data is also processed — solely for display and financial analysis. All in accordance with GDPR requirements.

items.q: Can I create my own savings goals?
items.a: Yes. In mWallet, you can set goals — for example, for a trip, a new laptop, or an emergency fund. The app will help you track your progress and remind you when to save more.

items.q: What happens to my data if I opt out of mWallet?
items.a: You can deactivate mWallet at any time. Your data will no longer be shown in the app, and information from external accounts will be permanently deleted.

items.q: Is mWallet available for business clients?
items.a: Currently, mWallet is designed for individual users. For businesses, mBank offers other analytical tools such as CompanyNet and mOrganizer Finansów.
